title: Altinn layout settings
description: Schema that describes settings for the layout configuration for Altinn applications.

triggers.title: Triggers
triggers.description: Triggers that apply for all navigation components across all pages. Can be overrided at the component level.

showProgress.title: Show progress indicator
showProgress.description: Enables a progress indicator in the upper right corner of the app

order.description: An array specifying which order the pages should appear in the application

excludeFromPdf.description: An array specifying which pages to exclude from the pdf

hideCloseButton.description: An attribute specifiying if the close button should be hidden

showLanguageSelector.description: An attribute specifying if the translation dropdown menu should be visible

showExpandWidthButton.description: An attribute for specifying whether the expand width button should be visible

pdfLayoutName.description: Name of a custom layout file to use for PDF creation instead of the automatically generated PDF.
